member.summary: Sychronously waits for the specified amount and ends the process afterwards.
member.remarks: This method allows for a clean exit, since it also waits until the StandardOutput and StandardError pipes are processed to the end.
member.returns: true, if the process has exited gracefully; false otherwise.

member.name: M:MediaBrowser.Controller.ProcessRun.ProcessRunnerBase.WaitAndKillAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously waits for the specified amount and ends the process afterwards.
member.remarks: Tjhis method performs the wait operation on a threadpool thread. Only recommended for short timeouts and situations where a synchronous call is undesired.
member.returns: true, if the process has exited gracefully; false otherwise.

member.name: M:MediaBrowser.Controller.ProcessRun.ProcessRunnerBase.WaitForExitAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Waits asynchronously for the process to exit.
member.returns: true, if the process has exited, false if the process is still running.
member.remarks: This methods waits until the process has existed or the has elapsed. This method does not end the process itself.

member.name: M:MediaBrowser.Controller.ProcessRun.ProcessRunnerBase.WaitForExitAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Waits asynchronously for the process to exit.
member.remarks: This methods waits until the process has existed or the has been triggered. This method does not end the process itself.
member.returns: true, if the process has exited, false if the process is still running.
